channel.title: The Hobbit
channel.description:
I don't know if LoR is popular else where other than the united states, but the hobbit has been in "production" for atleast 5 years.
Here's finally some progress. http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=wPkL7V1kExg&feature=channel_video_title

item.title: The Hobbit
item.dc:creator: @rant rant
item.description:
@rant wrote:

lord of the rings movies sucked IMO, it’s extremely dorky, they did a terrible job forming it to the book, and they just HAD to make Gandalf the Grey, Gandalf the Gay by hiring whathisface. let’s just say im a hater of this one series, i’m not imposing my opinion on any of you. I’d just prefer there not to be another movie.

Read full topic

item.description:

[quote=“iCreatedHorror, post:17, topic:391250”][quote author=Sun Chips link=topic=487192.msg3572834#msg3572834 date=1303179424]

@topic: time to find that book and reread it.

I had no idea it was that old :o
I have it sitting on my dresser atm
[/quote]
I have my dads copy from when he was a kid. It’s in crappy shape and put away somewhere, which is why I need to find it.
Also, watched the animated one from start to finish today - if falling asleep half way through counts.[/quote]

Read full topic

item.description:

[quote=“Sun Chips, post:9, topic:391250”]The book was quite amazing so I hope they stick as close as possible to it, though I know they never do…but still what if… :rolleyes:[/quote]Usually, they do a great job with LoR movies. They don’t leave out TOO much, like chronicles of narnia or anything.

item.title: The Hobbit
item.dc:creator: @Slave_Scyth Slave Scyth
item.description:
@Slave_Scyth wrote:

[quote=“Loveandpower, post:7, topic:391250”][quote author=Tom_BETA link=topic=487192.msg3571949#msg3571949 date=1303111844]
Yes, it’s very popular here in the UK (and I’m sure in many other places). I watched a bit of the video but just out of curiosity (I’m sure it mentions it in the video) how long is left until it is ready to go? It looks like something I’d watch.

[quote author=Loveandpower link=topic=487192.msg3571795#msg3571795 date=1303098540]

[quote author=the elve age link=topic=487192.msg3570577#msg3570577 date=1303006594]

About time; still haven’t managed to sit through that stupid animated one.
[/quote]I don’t think anyone has ha
[/quote]I quite enjoyed the animated one thank you very much lol.

Good to see another one is coming out though I had so many questions about other one.

Ugh, I can’t stand animated films
[/quote]I try to look at the storyline not the graphics lol.[/quote]Stick to books, then.

Read full topic

item.title: The Hobbit
item.dc:creator: @Tom Tom
item.description:
@Tom wrote:

Some of them can have good story lines, yeah. But I don’t like the animated method of getting those story lines across to the viewer. If put together correctly I’m sure an animated film would be okay to watch.

Read full topic
